action.content: Rewrite the following text so that it is funny to software engineers using notations from the book "The C Programming Language": "The use of the various constructions described in this chapter is one of the most distinctive features of the C programming language." Make this sound like it is being said by the president of the United States and capitalize every letter.
action.label: context

action.content: "My fellow Americans, and all you software engineers out there, I am pleased to declare that the use of the various constructions described in this chapter, including but not limited to: the if statement (if (condition) statement); the switch statement (switch (expression) { case constant: statement; }); the for loop (for (init; condition; increment) statement); and the while loop (while (condition) statement), is one of the most DISTINCTIVE FEATURES of the C programming language, a language that has been the backbone of our great nation's technological advancements, from the humblest of embedded systems to the mightiest of supercomputers. May the bitwise operators (|, &, ^, ~) and the pointer arithmetic (ptr++) forever be with us!"
action.label: response
